name: Slendrina Loves Slenderman
description:
This is the story of Slendrina Loves Slenderman.

You have a flashlight. Watch out and do not waste your battery. If the battery runs out, you can stay in the dark. You should find the batteries around.

She will do anything to stop you. Whatever you do, do not look back!

Try to find 8 page.


If you like Slender Man, then you will love this horror game.
